mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PEN_OBJ_BR_EXE_GRP_ERR_L ( OBJ_TYPE_ID, OBJ_ID, BR_EXE_GRP_SEQ, ERR_SEQ, DEL_YN, CRET_DT, CRETR_ID, CHG_DT, CHGR_ID, ERR_ID, ERR_NM, ERR_DESC ) VALUES ( #{OBJ_TYPE_ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{OBJ_ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BR_EXE_GRP_SEQ, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ERR_SEQ, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{DEL_YN, jdbcType=CHAR}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{CRETR_ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{CHGR_ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ERR_ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ERR_NM, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ERR_DESC, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
